original_title: South Shore People Power, Fore River Residents Say NO Fracked Gas Weymouth Compressor Station
overview: South Shore People Power is a documentary film about the fight to stop Enbridge Corporation from building a dangerous and destructive 7,700 horsepower fracked gas compressor station in a hightly populated area of Weymouth and Quincy.
title: South Shore People Power, Fore River Residents Say NO Fracked Gas Weymouth Compressor Station
